summary: Comprehensive testing of Engagement Pulse MVP completed - backend APIs working, frontend loads correctly, authentication flow functional, dashboard displays seeded data

minor_issues.issue: Returns unexpected status for invalid HTTP methods
minor_issues.impact: Low - API correctly handles standard CRUD operations

ui_bugs.issue: Pulse form shows loading state indefinitely

design_issues.issue: Feature cards selector returned 0 cards instead of expected 4 cards

passed_tests: Landing page loads with 'Get Started' and 'Sign In' buttons
Demo data seeded successfully (clients, engagements, users, pulses)
Authentication system working with session tokens
Portfolio dashboard loads for authenticated admin/lead users
Engagement detail page shows all tabs (Overview, Pulses, Milestones, Risks, Issues, Contacts)
Admin setup page allows viewing clients with CRUD buttons visible
Role-based access control working (CONSULTANT vs ADMIN/LEAD)
RAG status display and health scoring functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix pulse form loading issue - form appears stuck in loading state when accessing /pulse/eng_001. All other major functionality working correctly.
